meanings.sent1: Tommy told a tarradiddle about his missing homework.
meanings.sent2: She knew it was just a tarradiddle when he claimed he had seen a unicorn.
meanings.sent3: The tarradiddle about the dog eating his homework made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her excuse was a tarradiddle as thin as a spider's web.
meanings.sent5: The tarradiddle unraveled as soon as she was questioned further.

meanings.sent1: The speaker's speech was full of tarradiddle, trying to impress the audience.
meanings.sent2: Don't believe the tarradiddle he tells about his extravagant lifestyle.
meanings.sent3: His explanation was a tarradiddle that no one took seriously.
meanings.sent4: The tarradiddle of his importance crumbled when no one recognized him.
meanings.sent5: She saw through his tarradiddle and knew he was just pretending.
